|brand = nVIDIA |model = Shield TV |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Darcy |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = P2897 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Android media player, media streamer, game console, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VOB-P2897, VOB-P2571, VOB-P2920 |icid = 7361A-P2897 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;Tegra X1; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v8<!-- 4x ARM Cortex-A57 4x ARM Cortex-A53 --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDIN9DW4-16G; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 3 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111GS; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Android TV;8.0;Oreo;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, HDMI, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.1 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 2.0b, Bluetooth 4.1, DFS (slave), fan, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/29/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01N1NT9Y6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *'''NVIDIA Shield TV''' (2017) - 16Gb (eMMC), USB, No MicroSD Card slot, :No Infrared control; Remote: Coin cell battery, No headphone jack *'''NVIDIA Shield TV Pro''' (2017) - 500GB HDD (int.), [https://www.androidcentral.com/nvidia-shield-pro-vs-standard-which-should-i-buy MicroSD Card slot], :Micro USB port; Remote: Rechargeable battery, Headphone jack
===Specifications=== :;NVIDIA Shield TV ''Darcy'' (2017) *Model: P2897 *SoC: ''[[NVIDIA]]'' Tegra X1 @2.0GHz armv8l (Quad Core) :4x ARM Cortex-A57 + 4x ARM Cortex-A53 (64-bit) :GPU: ''GeForce'' 6 ULP (GM204) @1.0GHz (256-cores) *Flash: 16GB (eMMC), RAM: 3GB (DDR3) *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz 2x2) *Ethernet: 1x GbE port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.1 *A/V Out: HDMI 2.0b (4K HDR, 1080p) :3840x2160 @60Hz, Rec.2020, HDCP 2.2 *Remote: Bluetooth, IR, Microphone *Gamepad: ''NVIDIA Shield Controller'' *OS: Android TV 7.0 (Nougat) :SHIELD Experience 6.2 *Power: DC 19V/2.1A (1.8m)
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/shield/specs/ Product page] (2017){{â€¢}}[https://www.nvidia.com/en-gb/shield/shield-tv/ Product page] (2019)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.ixbt.com/live/kyrie1965/nvidia-shield-tv---bezzhalostnyy-palach-rynka-android-boksov.html ''NVIDIA Shield TV'' on '''iXBT'''] *[https://www.ixbt.com/multimedia/nvidia-shield-tv-2017.shtml ''NVIDIA Shield TV 2017'' on '''iXBT''']
==See also== *[[NVIDIA Shield TV]] {{WPLink|Shield_Android_TV}} *[[NVIDIA Shield Portable]] {{WPLink|Shield_Portable}} *[[NVIDIA Shield Tablet]] {{WPLink|Shield_Tablet}}
